text:
Please consider re-filing this bug already filed as :
http://archive.apache.org/gnats/7479, but which seems to have been lost during
bug tracker transition.

This bug still occurs and greatly reduces the ability to debug apache's beahviour.

Many thanks in advance
This is fixed in 2.1.x, try out the 2.1.8-beta.
creator: chip@force-elite.com
